Transitioning Youth and Adults

ASERT

The ASERT Collaborative (Autism Services, Education, Resources and Training) is a statewide partnership that provides streamlined access to information to the Pennsylvania autism community. ASERT offers resources covering a wide range of topics for self-advocates, caregivers, professionals, and community members while also providing information on events, support groups, and free online trainings.

 877-231-4244   ·    info@paautism.org

 Statewide, N/A, PA 00000

 www.paautism.org

Center for Community Resources

SUPPORTS COORDINATION SERVICES FOR INDIVIDUALS DIAGNOSED WITH INTELLECTUAL DISABILITIES, AUTISM, OR MEDICALLY COMPLEX DIAGNOSES.

Lehigh Valley Center for Independent Living

LVCIL is a non-profit organization based in Allentown, PA that provides services and support to people with all types of disabilities.

 610-770-9781   ·    info@LVCIL.org

 713 N. 13th St., Allentown, PA 18102

 lvcil.org

SimplyHome

SimplyHome provides enabling technology and Remote Support services that help people with intellectual and developmental disabilities (I/DD) live more independently and safely in their own homes. Our platform combines smart home technology, virtual support tools, and real-time data to support individuals, families, and care providers.

 828-844-0452   ·    kristie.ondisco@simply-home.com

 none, none, none, PA 17954

 simply-home.com

Elementary (Grades K-6)   Secondary (Grades 7-12)   Post Secondary (High School and Beyond)   ·   Transitioning Youth and Adults

Thrive Center for Independent Living

Thrive Center for Independent Living is a community-based, nonprofit organization dedicated to empowering people with disabilities to live independently and fully participate in society. Thrive CIL works hand in hand with individuals to break down barriers, build confidence, and create opportunities for a better quality of life.

 717-731-1900   ·    gtaveras@thrivecil.org

 2601 Herr Street, Harrisburg, PA 17103

 thrivecil.org
